Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product. This item holds significant value for me, but recognizing its immense worth to you, I aim to make this transaction beneficial for both parties. I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $950000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value I place on it and the substantial benefit it would bring to you. I believe this price reflects the product's quality and the value it would add to your endeavors. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal. Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions regarding the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
